text: jaan lo ki tumhaare beech allaah ka rasool maujood hai. bahut-se maamalon mein yadi vah tumhaaree baat maan le to tum kathinaee mein pad jao. kintu allaah ne tumhaare lie eemaan ko priy bana diya aur use tumhaare dilon mein sundarata de dee aur inakaar, ullanghan aur avagya ko tumhaare lie bahut apriy bana diya.
